overview:
Entrepreneurial senior interactive marketing and sales executive with more than 18 years of experience in creating and executing business, product, sales and marketing plans. Passionate and creative, always focused on creating new opportunities by extending and creating new company core competencies. Deep experience in search, social media and search marketing, with an emphasis on creating new business processes and opportunity to drive massive revenue growth. A decisive leader and innovative thinker who has the proven ability to lead recruit, manage and drive multi-disciplinary teams to generate new avenues for corporate growth. Manager and cultivator of mission-critical client, partner and employee relationships.

Executive Highlights As Founder and President, created search engine optimization and social media management consultancy from start-up to sale to PM Digital.

Expertise in creating new business lines that reflects emerging market demand and creates position of market leadership.

Extensive staff recruitment and management experience with ability to identify, hire and retain key employees.

Frequent speaker and author, often used as industry expert source for publications such as Internet Retailer.

Published in Internet Retailer, iMedia Connection and other publications, and speaker at events such as Digital Hollywood and SMX.

relationships.title: Vice President, Search and Social media
